tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditExtensions>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditExtensions>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="Features:
- Config editors for ventrilo_srv.ini

Other config editors are possible but Ventrilo overwrites the files when it is restarted." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2013-01-11 22:22:32" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATE_SYMLINK" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCAGH:InstallAdminTemplate" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<MailTemplate xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <FromName />
 <FromEmail />
 <Subject />
 <HtmlBody />
 <TextBody>;Embedded Script.net script 
$snet&lt;%=DateTime.Now;%&gt;</TextBody>
 <ToEmails />
 <ToRoles />
 <CcEmails />
 <CcRoles />
 <BccEmails />
 <BccRoles />
</MailTemplate>" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCAGH:InstallUserTemplate" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>

tc_game_config_files.description: Main settings for your Ventrilo server.
tc_game_config_files.template: [Server] Name=$[HostName] Phonetic=![Phonetic] Port=$[Service.GamePort] Auth=$[IsPrivate] Duplicates=![Duplicates] AdminPassword=$[RConPassword] Password=$[PrivatePassword] MaxClients=$[Service.Slots] SendBuffer=![SendBuffer] RecvBuffer=![RecvBuffer] Diag=0 LogonTimeout=![LogonTimeout] CloseStd=1 TimeStamp=![TimeStamp] PingRate=![PingRate] ExtraBuffer=0 ChanWidth=![ChanWidth] ChanDepth=![ChanDepth] ChanClients=![ChanClients] DisableQuit=![DisableQuit] VoiceCodec=![VoiceCodec] VoiceFormat=![VoiceFormat] SilentLobby=![SilentLobby] AutoKick=![AutoKick]

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Mode" value="SingleLine" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="Width" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Rows" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Wrap" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This is the name of the server that appears at the top of the active user list when someone connects.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Mode" value="SingleLine" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="Width" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Rows" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Wrap" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="RegEx" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="DenyChars" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This is the phonetic pronunciation of the server name. If left blank the servers Name will be used in all TTS events that involve the servers name being announced.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="StartIndex" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Source" value="CustomList" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="CustomList" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <CustomDataSourceItem>
 <Value>0</Value>
 <DisplayText>Anyone can connect</DisplayText>
 <Selected>true</Selected>
 </CustomDataSourceItem>
 <CustomDataSourceItem>
 <Value>1</Value>
 <DisplayText>Global password authentication</DisplayText>
 <Selected>false</Selected>
 </CustomDataSourceItem>
 <CustomDataSourceItem>
 <Value>2</Value>
 <DisplayText>User/password authentication</DisplayText>
 <Selected>false</Selected>
 </CustomDataSourceItem>
</ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem>" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemFilterType" value="Files" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemFilter" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemExcludeFilter" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemIncludeSubDirectories" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemItemValue" value="FileName" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemItemDisplay" value="FileName" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
This is the authentication mode.
0 = No authentication and anyone can connect. 1 = Global password authentication. 2 = Specific user/password authentication.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="StartIndex" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Source" value="CustomList" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="CustomList" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <CustomDataSourceItem>
 <Value>1</Value>
 <DisplayText>Global password authentication</DisplayText>
 <Selected>true</Selected>
 </CustomDataSourceItem>
 <CustomDataSourceItem>
 <Value>2</Value>
 <DisplayText>User/password authentication</DisplayText>
 <Selected>false</Selected>
 </CustomDataSourceItem>
</ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem>" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemFilterType" value="Files" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemFilter" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemExcludeFilter" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemIncludeSubDirectories" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemItemValue" value="FileName" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemItemDisplay" value="FileName" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
This is the authentication mode.
1 = Global password authentication. 2 = Specific user/password authentication.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Mode" value="Password" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="Width" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Rows" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Wrap" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="RegEx" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="DenyChars" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This is the remote server administration password. Leaving this option blank will disable remote admin logins. This password is used by normal login accounts and they activate a menu option to have admin rights assigned to their login.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Mode" value="Password" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="Width" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Rows" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="Wrap" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This is the global login password for when Authentication=Global password authentication. All users connecting to this server must have this password, otherwise the server will send back an error message saying that they could not be authenticated.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Allows duplicate login names" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="1" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="0" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Enables or disables duplicate login names. Unchecked = Disables duplicates. Checked = Allows duplicate login names. If disabled and someone logs in with a user name identical to that of a currently connected user, the server will disconnect the first user. This setting should only be used when Auth = Specific user/password authentication for sanity reasons but it can be disabled for any Auth mode. Note: When this option is set to 0 it creates problems for clients that had auto-reconnect enabled, however, starting with version 2.0.0 this is no longer a problem.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="131072" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="393216" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
This option specifies the size of the TCP outbound buffers to each client. The value is in bytes.
A value of 0 will force the program to use a default value of 131072 bytes. If you have a smaller value then I recommend setting it to 0 and let the program use its default.
In the servers log file there will be a line starting with "MSG_CONN" when a new client connects. At the end of this line will be two pairs of numbers (A,B) (C,D). The A number is the buffer size as defined by your platform. The B number is the buffer size as reported by the system after the Ventrilo server has changed it. The number could be larger or smaller depending on the platform.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="131072" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="393216" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
This option specifies the size of the TCP inbound buffers for each client. The value is in bytes.
A value of 0 will force the program to use it's default settings of 131072 bytes per client connection.
In the servers log file there will be a line starting with "MSG_CONN" when a new client connects. At the end of this line will be two pairs of numbers (A,B) (C,D). The C number is the buffer size as defined by your platform. The D number is the buffer size as reported by the system after the Ventrilo server has changed it. The number could be larger or smaller depending on the platform.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="5" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="60" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This option specifies in seconds how long a client has to logon to the server before it is automatically disconnected. Once logged on the option has no meaning.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="1" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="60" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This option allows the administrator to change the interval at which the server pings the clients. The value is specified in seconds and defaults to 10. Setting to a lower value might be useful for diagnosing problem clients especially when the remote console command "pingtrace" is used.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="65535" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This option enables auto-kicking of a client after it has been connected for X number of seconds. A value of 0 disables the autokick feature, otherwise it specifies the number of seconds that a client is allowed to remain connected before the server will automatically disconnect them. This feature is primarily intended for professional hosting services who setup servers for potential customers to test the quality of the hosters network and machines, while at the same time prevent people from hijacking the server for their own private use.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Enable console timestamp" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="1" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="0" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
Unchecked = Disable console timestamp's. Checked = Enable console timestamp's.
This option enables or disables timestamp's being displayed in console messages. This includes remote consoles.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Disable remote "quit" command" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="1" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="0" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
Unchecked = Allow remote consoles to issue the "quit" command. Checked = Disable (prevent) remote console from issuing the "quit" command.
This option prevents remote console commands (those typed into the chat window when logged in with server admin rights) from issuing the "quit" command which would instruct the server to exit the system. However, if the server was started in a non-daemon mode the local console can still issue the quit command.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="65535" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This option specifies a maximum number of parallel sub-channels that can be created in each channel. It has no effect on root level channels which only server admin's can create. A value of 0 means there is no limit.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="65535" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This option specifies the maximum number of nested sub-channels (depth) that can be created. A value of 0 means the server will use it's default max value of 8 nested channels.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="65535" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="True" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This option specifies the maximum number of clients allowed in any channel. A value of 0 means there is no limit to the number of clients per channel.

tc_dynamic_form_items.description: This option tells the server which codec all clients must use.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Text" value="Make the lobby silent" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OnValue" value="1" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="OffValue" value="0" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description:
Unchecked = Allow replication. Checked = Suppress replication, thus making the lobby silent.
This option allows or suppresses replication of voice, wave binds and TTS binds when the client is in the main lobby.
